properties.text:
--- SAVING ---

Progress will be saved
automatically.

The next time you return to
this page, you will be asked if
you would like to continue where
you left off.

Save data is stored on your device.
Chapter select can be used to navigate
if you lose your place or switch devices

Prologue

Welcome to the Secret Library,

an archive of magical and occult artifacts 
curated by the witch, Sylvia. 
Over the centuries, certain rare items 
have gone missing.

Finding and recovering these artifacts is the
responsibility of Library Detective Alex,
and his partner Zara, a witch intern
who specializes in necromancy

They are known as the O.A.R. Team

Occult Artifact Recovery
